# Input data

```{python} 
data = """
retweet
hashtag
podcast
stan
Covid-19
photobomb
upvote
Covid
deadname
Bitcoin
stablecoin
selfie
SARS
open-world
sovereign wealth fund
vlog
long Covid
live blog
vape
vaccine passport
"""
```

# Tokenize input string

```{python}
words = []
for word in data.split("\n"):
    word_toks = word.split(" ")
    if (word != "") and (len(word_toks) < 2):
        words.append(word_toks[0])

print(f'{len(words)} words:\n')
for word in words:
    print(word)
```

# Format for CQL query

```{python}
words_cql = '[word="'
for word in words:
    words_cql += word + '|'

words_cql = words_cql[:-1] 
words_cql += '"]'

words_cql
```

# Copy to clipboard:

```{python}
import pyperclip

pyperclip.copy(words_cql)
```
